definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: Techniques and Methods for Tissue-culture of Growing Lamina from Phalaenopsis spp.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶兰叶片组织快速繁殖工艺和方法。

sentences.english: Autumn, the buds of Phalaenopsis grown up and smell issued.
sentences.chinese: 秋天，蝴蝶兰的嫩芽长大了，也发出了更浓的香味。

sentences.english: Kalanchoe and phalaenopsis are popular as they make great ornamental plants.
sentences.chinese: 长寿花和蝴蝶兰都是观赏植物，很受欢迎。

sentences.english: The flower induction facility can regulate the flowering period of Phalaenopsis orchid and increase the profit for the farmers.
sentences.chinese: 冷房催花设施可有效调节蝴蝶兰花期，以增加收益。

sentences.english: Effect of cytokinin on the induction and macromolecules metabolic kinetics of somatic embryogenesis in Phalaenopsis sp.
sentences.chinese: 细胞分裂素对蝴蝶兰体细胞胚诱导及大分子代谢研究。

sentences.english: It was found that different environmental gave great effects on the growth of Phalaenopsis.
sentences.chinese: 同时研究发现，不同的环境对蝴蝶兰的生长影响很大。

sentences.english: The factors influencing on the aseptic culture of Phalaenopsis hybrid seeds were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了影响不同倍性蝴蝶兰杂交种子离体培养的因素。

definition: to join jade annuli/fig. to combine two good things
erhua variant of 錢串|钱串[qian2 chuan4]
eta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
many things arranged together, or connected together/to go on limitlessly
narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
